column1: Nutritional values per ½ Deluxe Tub

> 🌿 **Vegan & Dairy-free**
Recipe is using only soy milk and protein. Spin on Sorbet, followed by a scrape-down, and either a Respin or Mix-In run.
**This is an experimental recipe, and great texture is not guaranteed!**

1. Mix the boiling water with the cocoa powder to bloom it, then let it cool down.
 1. Add "wet" ingredients and the bloomed cocoa to empty Creami tub.
The [brand names] used are in brackets.
